CrossReference_Identifier Property

CDXML Name:CrossReferenceIdentifier
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_CrossReference_Identifier
CDX Constant Value:0x0F02
Data Size:CDXString
Property of objects:kCDXObj_CrossReference
First written/read in:ChemDraw 7.0
Required?Required for cross-references.

Description:

A unique (but otherwise random) identifier for a given Cross-Reference object.

Unlike the object's ID, this identifier is guaranteed to be both persistent and unique, even across multiple documents. It is a GUID, a standard Globally-Unique IDentifier broadly used under Microsoft Windows. The standard Windows program guidgen.exe may be used to generate GUIDs external to ChemDraw.
